comments:
Driver:  RC1 12/02 00:59

When going through a Web service client wizards on a non-existing project targeting Geronimo, I got the error:

IWAB0014E Unexpected exception occured.
  null argument:
      org.eclipse.core.internal.runtime.AssertionFailedException: null argument:

Kathy, this is either us, or facets, sending in what looks like a bogus progress monitor to the platform. Please take a peek and reassign as appropriate.
Problem is no longer there with WTP 1.0.1 20060131 and Geronimo 0130 plugin.
